title: Energy & Climate: Joint downstream industry statement on CBAM
author: Toma Mikalauskaitė Silvia Selandar
text:
Toma Mikalauskaitė 
						
                        
						                             Adviser – Energy and Environment 
						
                        
                         
                     Orgalim, together with ten other associations representing a wide range of EU manufacturing industries (technology and engineering, automobile, home appliances, catering equipment, refrigerators, HVAC equipment), is convinced of the importance of our role in ensuring that Europe can deliver on its commitment to carbon neutrality by 2050 at the latest. As EU-based industries, we continue to invest to offer our products in line with ambitious environmental standards. To read our recommendations in full, please download the document above.
